data.title: Tracking COVID-19 in California
data.author: Michael Sullivan
data.excerpt: Data reporting note Data on cases, deaths, and testing is not reported on weekends or state holidays. This data is reported on the first day following the weekend or holiday. Data on administered vaccines is reported daily. Update for {{_varStatDate_}} As of {{_varStatDateNoYear_}}, California has {{_varStatTotalCases_}} confirmed cases of COVID-19, resulting in {{_varStatTotalDeaths_}} deaths. Cases […]
